txt.en: Damrod can be found in Barad Orhant in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should bring the gaunt-man sigils to Damrod.
Gaunt-men can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should collect their sigils from them as they fall.

'I have heard the accounts from Dolenthol that merrevail have been seen collecting blades made of Morgul steel from the Circle of Sorrow. I would not be surprised if the merrevail also seek other trinkets of evil within the city. I have seen the gaunt-men carry terrible sigils with them. We should search out and destroy these sigils before the merrevail are able to get them.'

'I thank you, [placeholder]. I will have these vile sigils destroyed immediately. You have done the Rangers of Ithilien a great service, but I suppose that is nothing new. All the same, thank you once again.'
Damrod wishes to gather the sigils of the gaunt-men who wander the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.
Bring the gaunt-man sigils to Damrod in Barad Orhant
